dct_title_s: Novissima et accuratissima totius Americæ descriptio
dct_description_sm: Shows drainage, views of Indians, animals, ships, etc. Ornamental figures in upper left corner & in cartouche in lower left corner. Relief shown pictorially. From: Die unbekante neue Welt ... Amsterdam : J. Meurs, 1673.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
